name: Edie Fine Bone China Side Plate
description:
E is for Edie, who features on this side plate.  Perfect for a generous slice of cake!

Diameter 20.5cms
Circular Edie motif and gold rim
Each plate has the dolls name on the base

Matching Mug and Tea Plate also available. 

To preserve the gold, please hand wash gently and don't put in the dishwasher or microwave.

name: Paradise Coral Wash Bag  LOW STOCK
description:
New New New! 

I'm thrilled to finally unveil my new collection of wash bags.  Each design is available in two sizes, both are lovely and roomy, the medium is the perfect cosmetic bag, the large is great for travel.

This classic design features Sea Fan and Branching Corals in a gorgeous amethyst and mint colour way.

Printed on a beautiful natural linen/cotton mix, they have a matt PVC coating, making them practical and durable as well as beautiful.  Lined with signature neon yellow, they're sure to add a bit of cheer to the darkest of days.

Medium 26x16x8cms
Large 30x22x10cms

name: Penny Doll Velvet Cutout Cushion
description:
Have your very own divine velvet Penny Doll cushion.  Or give it to someone else if you can possibly bear to part with it.  The colours of the print on this upholstery weight velvet are intense and really rather stunning.  The cushions measure approximately 65 x 38cms (varies slightly for each doll).  Choose from Lulu, Edie, Veronica or Olive.  Non removable cover, stuffed with plush man-made fibre.

Cotton Velvet Front, Grey Cotton Reverse.

Image shows dolls L-R Lulu, Olive, Veronica, Edie

**Please allow 4 weeks for delivery as this item is printed and made to order**

name: Paradise Parrot Wash Bag LOW STOCK
description:
New New New! 

I'm very pleased to finally unveil my new collection of wash bags.  Each design is available in two sizes, both are lovely and roomy, the medium is the perfect cosmetic bag, the large is great for travel.

This stunning design features a parrot in flight and a pineapple, in grey and vivid teal.

Printed on a beautiful natural linen/cotton mix, they have a matt PVC coating, making them practical and durable as well as beautiful.  Lined with signature neon yellow, they're sure to add a bit of cheer to the darkest of days.

Medium 26x16x8cms
Large 30x22x10cms

name: Lulu Fine Bone China Mug
description:
L is for Lulu! Fine bone china mug, hand decorated in Stoke-on-Trent, and finished with a gilded rim. Each doll has it's name written on the back-stamp, making these a thoroughly brilliant and collectable gift.

Approx. 9x7.5cms (not including handle).

Comes in a white branded gift box.

Tea Plates & Side Plates featuring the dolls are also available.

name: Pineapple Pavilion Silk Cushion
description:
Divine silk cotton cushion featuring my Pineapple motif, it's my current favourite.

Digitally printed silk cotton front
Grey cotton reverse and black piping
Concealed zip in base
Feather pad included for UK orders only please choose 'COVER ONLY' option for non UK orders.

45x45cms or 60x60cms

Please note:  Made to order, 3-4 week lead time.

name: Zebras Pipes N' Roses Silk Cotton Cushion
description:
With a nod to the surreal, I've re-worked some of my favourite elements from past designs into this stunning silk cushion.

Silk Cotton front
Cotton reverse
Piped
Concealed zip
Includes feather pad for UK orders.  For non UK orders please choose the COVER ONLY option.

Available in two sizes - 60x60cms or 45x45cms

Please note: Made to order, lead time 3-4 weeks.

name: 'Smokin'' Cushion
description:
This is a pipe.

Hand printed on linen with ruche trim
30x50cms
Concealed zip along base
Feather pad included for UK deliveries only.  If ordering for delivery outside the UK, please select COVER ONLY option.

name: Penny Kaleidoscope Silk Cotton Cushion
description:
Featuring Lulu, Olive, Veronica and Edie, this kaleidoscopic treat will bring a smile to everyone's face as the girls whirl and twirl in their Penny Doll playground.  Printed silk cotton with cotton reverse.

60x60cms
Silk Cotton front
Cotton reverse
Piped
Concealed zip
Includes feather pad for UK deliveries.  For non UK deliveries please select the COVER ONLY option.

Available in Midnight (charcoal grey) or Acid (yellow)

Please note:  Made to order, please allow 3-4 weeks lead time.

name: 'Night Night' Hand Printed Cushion
description:
Luxurious cushion for your bed!  Some would say that if you already have too many cushions for your sofa that you shouldn't buy any more.  I say, just buy them for other places!  Looks great on it's own, even better paired with the 'Sleep Tight' cushion. 

35 x 70 cms
Concealed zip along base
Feather pad included for UK deliveries, for deliveries outside the UK please select COVER ONLY.
Dry clean only

name: 'Sleep Tight' Hand Printed Cushion
description:
A luxurious cushion for your bed!  Some would say that if you already have too many cushions for your sofa, that you shouldn't buy any more.  I say, just buy them for other places!  Looks great on it's own, even better paired with the 'Night Night' cushion.

35 x 70 cms
Concealed zip along base
Feather pad included (UK only, please select COVER ONLY if outside the UK)
Dry clean only

name: 'Pin Cushion'
description:
Hand printed linen cushion featuring a giant safety pin. 

Neon Pink on Linen with ruche trim
35 x 70 cms
concealed zip along base

Feather pad included for UK orders only.  Non UK orders should select the COVER ONLY option.

name: 'Lily Quintuple' Hand Printed Cushion
description:
Beautiful, luxurious cushion with Lily repeated five times.  Something about her stance reminds me of Andy Warhol's Elvis print with him pointing a gun....don't you think?  I think she looks a bit menacing, which is probably why I like her so much, though I'm not sure what that says about me. Hmmm.

The neon pink works beautifully with the natural linen, but if it's not your thing, the black is equally as lovely, more subdued with a slightly aged look.

35 x 70 cms
Hand printed linen front panel, backed piped with black cotton drill
Closed with two chunky buttons on the back

Feather pad included for UK orders only.  Non UK orders should select the COVER ONLY option.

name: Elizabeth II Limited Edition Cushion
description:
Officially licensed image, this stunning, hand printed cushion, is the perfect commemorative gift (for someone else or yourself of course!).

The image is taken from a photograph following her coronation in 1953.

Stamped and numbered on reverse reading 'The Queen's Diamond Jubilee 1952-2012'.

A limited edition of 150.

45x45cms approx.
Black ink on Linen
Black pom pom trim

Feather pad included for UK orders only.  Non UK orders should chose the COVER ONLY option.

name: 'Roses For Liz' Cushion
description:
Beautiful hand printed linen cushion featuring oversize neon pink roses from our garden.  In memory of my lovely Mother In Law.  Rest in peace Liz.

Linen with ruche trim
45x45cms
concealed zip along base
feather pad included (UK orders only.  Non UK orders - please select the COVER ONLY option.


***PLEASE ALLOW 2 WEEKS FOR DELIVERY***

name: 'Rubbish Without You' Cushion
description:
Ta da! Here it is, by popular demand.  The Rubbish Without You cushion, hand printed onto off-white cotton, with a pom pom trim (of course!).  Plain reverse with Kiss Her label, and a neon green zip in the base.  Includes feather pad.

35x35 approx.
Spot clean only

Neon Pink / Turquoise Pom Pom Trim
Grey / Black Pom Pom Trim
Ultra Violet / Green Pom Pom Trim

Feather pad included for UK orders only.  If ordering from outside the UK, please select the COVER ONLY option.

name: 'Secret Garden' Cushion
description:
Pretty and bright - my favourite combination.  This image is taken from a photograph of my garden a.k.a the secret garden, with it's overgrown vines and rambling roses, I only wish I was a better gardener to do it justice.  The same image as my Secret Garden Lavender bags, only this one's filled with feathers, not lavender.  Gorgeous striped black and white cord trim.

35x35cms approx.
Feather pad included (UK orders only)
Violet ink on off white cotton
Plain back with Kiss Her label
Neon green zip in base

**PLEASE ALLOW TWO WEEKS FOR DELIVERY**

name: 'Chop Chop' Cushion
description:
Hand printed linen cushion featuring oversize antique wallpaper scissors.

Linen with ruche trim
30x50cms
concealed zip along base
feather pad included (UK orders only.  Non UK orders will receive cover only)

name: 'Zebras Crossing' Cushion
description:
Hand printed linen cushion featuring two zebras with crossed tails.

Linen with ruche trim
30x50cms
concealed zip along base
feather pad included (UK orders only.  Non UK orders will receive cover only)

name: Sweet Dreams (2013) Cushion
description:
A new version of Sweet Dreams for 2013!  Same size and credentials as the original, but with the Night Night / Sleep Tight typeface.  Whoop!

30x50cms
Hand printed on Linen
Neon pink ink
Green Pom Pom trim
Concealed zip in base
Plain linen reverse
Includes feather pad for UK orders.  Non UK orders should select the COVER ONLY option.

name: 'Sweet Dreams' Cushion
description:

Neon Pink print with Lime Pom Pom Trim.

Linen
30x50cms
concealed zip along base
feather pad included for UK orders.  Non UK orders should select the COVER ONLY option.

name: 'Lulu' LIMITED EDITION Mini-Print
description:
Lulu has finally made it onto paper, and she looks great in rose on this fab limited edition mini-print.

Signed, dated and numbered limited edition of 100
Rose ink on 270gsm Colorplan paper
Also available as one of a three part set with Lily and Veronica
21 x 29.7 cms (A4)
Fits standard frame

name: 'Lily' LIMITED EDITION Mini-Print
description:

Also available as one of a three part set with Lulu and Girl No.3
21 x 29.7 cms (A4)

name: 'Veronica' LIMITED EDITION Mini-Print
description:
Please welcome Veronica (Girl No.3)!  She joins the Penny Doll family, and stars on this lovely aqua mini-print.  Also available as an open edition print in black.

Signed, dated and numbered limited edition of 100
Aqua ink on 270gsm Colorplan paper
Also available as one of a three part set with Lily and Lulu
21 x 29.7 cms (A4)
Fits standard frame

name: 'Rubbish Without You' Screen Print
description:
My husband had the phrase 'life would be rubbish without you' engraved on my engagement ring, so this print is pretty close to my heart.  The phrase follows the inner right side of the heart, it's mirror image on the left.  All together now...'ahhhh'.

Hand pulled screen print
40 x 50cms
270gsm paper (UK made and FSC certified)
Sold unframed (fits off the shelf frame)

NOW AVAILABLE IN GREY & AQUA

Please contact bianca@kissher.co.uk before choosing the upgrade to Special Delivery option to make sure stock is available.

options.name: upgrade to Special Delivery (please contact for availability first)

name: 'Rubbish Without You' Limited Edition Screen Print
description:
A limited edition of 100 red 'Rubbish Without You' prints.  Each print is signed and numbered.

40x50 cms
Red acrylic ink on heavy white paper
FSC approved and acid free
Fits off the shelf frame
Sold unframed

name: 'When Stars Collide' Print
description:
Beautifully bold and simple, and brand new for 2013. Remember, romantic thoughts are for life, not just for Valentine's!

30x40cms
Highest quality giclee print on 189gsm fine art paper
Fits standard frame without mount

name: 'Kiss Her' Screen Print
description:
'Kiss Her' is one of my most popular designs and has featured in The Sunday Times Style, Elle Decoration and Ideal Home magazines.

I love the ambiguity of this phrase, and how it leads people to draw their own conclusion about it's meaning.

Hand-pulled screen print
270gsm acid free paper
40 x 50cms
Sold unframed (fits off the shelf frame)

name: 'Secrets' Print
description:
Where do you keep your secrets?

40x50cms
Screen print
270gsm acid free paper
Fits standard frame

name: 'He Loves Me' Print
description:
Always think positive.  Especially when it comes to love.

Small;
Giclee print
30x40cms - fits standard frame
189gsm fine art paper
Print only

Large;
Screen print
40x50cms - fits standard frame
270gsm acid free paper
Print only

name: 'Be More Brainy!' Giclee Print
description:
My daughter (6 going on 15) shouted these words at my husband in a fit of rage, on one particularly pleasant Monday morning.  It made us laugh, diffusing the situation, and it continues to make me giggle whenever I recall it, so I just couldn't resist making into a print.  Besides, what a brilliant mantra to live by!

Giclee print
30x40cms - fits standard frame
189gsm fine art paper
Print only

name: 'Oops-A-Daisy' Print
description:
This print works for grown-ups and kids.  I always was a sucker for Hugh Grant in Notting Hill, and I guess that's the inspiration for this print.  I probably shouldn't admit that though...

Small size;
Giclee print
30x40cms - fits standard frame
189gsm fine art paper
Print only

Large size;
Screen print
40x50cms - with a 1cm border all around
Fits standard frame
270gsm acid free paper
Print only

name: 'Kiss Her' (square) Screen Print
description:
The square version of my Kiss Her print, as seen in Sunday Times Style and Elle Decoration.

Hand pulled screen print
Red acrylic ink on white Colorplan 270gsm paper
40 x 40 cms
SOLD FRAMED OR UNFRAMED

Available framed in a high quality white wooden frame - no visible grain for a contemporary look.

name: 'From Here To Eternity' Bus Blind Print
description:
For all you lovers, my bus blind style print should be just the ticket!  Looks über chic above a bed or sofa, or leave un-hung and displayed sideways against a wall (guarantees some extra Brownie Points boys!)

Paper size 17 x 82 cms with a 1cm border all round

Giclee print on 189gsm high quality artists paper

PRINT ONLY

name: 'Silence Is Golden' Screen Print with Diamond Dust
description:
Well it is, isn't it?  And speech is Silver, apparently.

Hand pulled screen print
700gsm white Colorplan paper (acid free and FSC certified)
Light gold acrylic, hand printed, and finished with Diamond Dust
96 x 48cms (hand trimmed paper - allow a tolerance of up to 2cms)
Sold unframed - non standard frame size

This print is delivered by a courier.  Please supply a contact number when purchasing this print (in the 'message for merchant' section when checking out, or just send an email to bianca@kissher.co.uk).

**PLEASE NOTE, THIS PRINT IS MADE TO ORDER.  PLEASE ALLOW TWO TO FOUR WEEKS FOR DELIVERY.  PLEASE DON'T HESITATE TO GET IN TOUCH HOWEVER, IF YOUR ORDER IS URGENT, AS I MAY BE ABLE TO ACCOMMODATE YOU.**

FREE UK DELIVERY

name: 'Plenty' Leather Purse
description:
Beautiful, soft and tactile leather purse, foil blocked in gold with the text 'there are plenty of fish in the sea'.  The size lends itself to use as a cosmetic bag, large purse, or clutch.  Or, all of the above of course.

Citrus Leather
Silver Nylon Lining
Contrasting Cornflower Blue Zip
Approx. 22x15cms
Gift Boxed

Please email for a colour swatch if required.

Please note that due to the softness of the leather that the gold foiling may fade over time.

WAS £42.00 SAVE 50%

name: 'Makeup' Leather Purse
description:

name: 'Secret Garden' Lavender Bag
description:
This image is taken from a photograph of my garden, a.k.a the secret garden, with it's overgrown vines and rambling roses.  Hand printed and filled with English Lavender.  Helps keep those pesky moths away and smells fab.

Hand Printed Cotton Front
Plain Linen Back
Kiss Her hanging loop
Approx 10.5x10.5cms

name: 'Lucky Day' Tea Towel
description:
Cheer up a tedious task with this fabulous addition, or pop it in a frame for some very affordable art.  Makes a  brilliant gift.

Screen printed on 100% premium cotton in the UK. With a gorgeous bright Kiss Her label as a hanging loop.

Measures approx. 48 x 76 cms.
Wash Max 50 degrees.

name: 'Rubbish Without You' Tea Towel
description:

Makes a fabulous affordable gift.

48 x 76 cms with a gorgeously bright Kiss Her label as hanging loop

name: Zebras Crossing Tape
description:
New New New!  An exciting new addition to the Kiss Her range, this Zebras Crossing tape is perfect for bringing any plain paper to life.  Black print on clear tape means that it will take on the colour of any paper it's used on. But don't limit yourself to gift wrapping....the possibilities are endless!

2.5cms wide
33m long

Printed in the UK, of course.

Black print on clear tape means that it will take on the colour of any paper it's used on. But don't limit yourself to gift wrapping....the possibilities are endless!
